alert.note: Alert for Cleveland (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 15 at 6:16PM CDT until May 15 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CLEVELAND...NORTHERN BRADLEY...NORTHEASTERN CALHOUN AND NORTHWESTERN DREW COUNTIES... At 616 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Monticello to near Warren to near Hampton, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Warren... Hampton... Hermitage... Wilmar... Harrell... Weeks... Brandon... Hampton Municipal Airport... Lanark... Banks... Tinsman... Farmville... Orlando... Gravelridge... Woodberry... Rock Springs... Rye... Carmel... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
